code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function MessageBox(){const[message,setMessage]=useState("Generated message will appear here.");const handleEdit=()=>{const editedMessage=prompt("Edit Message:",message);if(editedMessage)setMessage(editedMessage);};const handleCopy=()=>{navigator.clipboard.writeText(message);alert("Message copied!");};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card message-box",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:message}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"action-buttons",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleCopy,children:"\uD83D\uDCCB Copy"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleEdit,children:"\u270F\uFE0F Edit"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{children:"\uD83D\uDCBE Save"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{children:"\uD83D\uDCE4 Share"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{children:"\uD83D\uDCE9 Send"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{children:"\uD83D\uDCE7 Email"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{children:"\u2B50 Favorite"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{children:"\uD83D\uDD04 Refresh"})]})]});}export default MessageBox;
